entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
